original_text: And it came to pass on the morrow, that the evil spirit from God came upon Saul, and he prophesied in the midst of the house: and David played with his hand, as at other times: and there was a javelin in Saul's hand.
korean_text: 그 이튿날 하나님께서 부리시는 악령이 사울에게 힘 있게 내리매 그가 집 안에서 정신 없이 떠들어대므로 다윗이 평일과 같이 손으로 수금을 타는데 그 때에 사울의 손에 창이 있는지라

sentences.original_text: And it came to pass on the morrow
that the evil spirit from God came upon Saul
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께로서 오는 사신한 신령이 사울에게 강림하고

sentences.original_text: and he prophesied in the midst of the house
and David played with his hand
and there was a javelin in Saul's hand
